item.text: In the fourth year that Jehoiakim son of Josiah was king of Judah, the Lord spoke to Jeremiah concerning all the people of Judah. (That was the same as the first year that Nebuchadnezzar was king of Babylon.)

<st data-num="0834" class="">So</st> the <st data-num="05030" class="">prophet</st> <st data-num="03414" class="">Jeremiah</st> <st data-num="01696 0559">spoke</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">to</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st> of <st data-num="03063" class="">Judah</st> and <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="03427" class="">people who were living</st> in <st data-num="03389" class="">Jerusalem</st>.<n id="1" />

“For the last 23 years, from the thirteenth year that Josiah son of Amon was ruling in Judah until now, the Lord’s messages have come to me, and I have told them to you over and over again. But you would not listen.
Over and over again the Lord has sent his servants the prophets to you. But you have not listened or paid attention.

He <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> through them,<n id="1" /> ‘<st data-num="0376" class="">Each</st> of you <st data-num="04994" class="">must</st> <st data-num="07725" class="">turn</st> from your <st data-num="07451" class="">wicked</st> <st data-num="01870" class="">ways</st> and stop doing the <st data-num="07455" class="">evil things</st> you are <st data-num="04611" class="">doing</st>.<n id="2" /> If you do, I will allow you to continue to <st data-num="03427" class="">live</st> here <st data-num="05921" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="0127" class="">land</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> <st data-num="03068" class="">I</st> <st data-num="05414" class="">gave</st> to you and your <st data-num="01" class="">ancestors</st> <st data-num="04480 05769 05704 05769">as a lasting possession</st>.<n id="3" />

Do <st data-num="0408" class="">not</st> <st data-num="01980" class="">pay</st> <st data-num="0310" class="">allegiance</st> to<n id="1" /> <st data-num="0312" class="">other</st> <st data-num="0430" class="">gods</st> and <st data-num="07812" class="">worship</st> and <st data-num="05647" class="">serve</st> them. Do <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="03707" class="">make</st> me <st data-num="03707" class="">angry</st> by the <st data-num="04639" class="">things</st> that <st data-num="03027" class="">you</st> <st data-num="04639" class="">do</st>.<n id="2" /> Then I will <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="07489" class="">cause</st> you any <st data-num="07489" class="">harm</st>.’
So, now the Lord says, ‘You have not listened to me. But you have made me angry by the things that you have done. Thus you have brought harm on yourselves.’
“Therefore, the Lord of Heaven’s Armies says, ‘You have not listened to what I said.

So I, the Lord, affirm that I will send for all the peoples of the north and my servant, King Nebuchadnezzar of Babylon. I will bring them against this land and its inhabitants and all the nations that surround it. I will utterly destroy the land, its inhabitants, and all the surrounding nations and make them everlasting ruins. I will make them objects of horror and hissing scorn.

I will <st data-num="06" class="">put an end</st> to the <st data-num="06963" class="">sounds</st> of <st data-num="08342" class="">joy</st> and <st data-num="08057" class="">gladness</st> and the <st data-num="06963" class="">glad celebration</st> of <st data-num="03618" class="">brides</st> and <st data-num="02860" class="">grooms</st> <st data-num="01992" class="">in these lands</st>.<n id="1" /> I will put an end to the <st data-num="06963" class="">sound</st> of people <st data-num="07347" class="">grinding meal</st>. I will put an end to <st data-num="05216" class="">lamps</st> <st data-num="0216" class="">shining</st> in their houses.<n id="2" />
This whole area will become a desolate wasteland. These nations will be subject to the king of Babylon for 70 years.’
“‘But when the seventy years are over, I will punish the king of Babylon and his nation for their sins. I will make the land of Babylon an everlasting ruin. I, the Lord, affirm it!

I will <st data-num="0935" class="">bring</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> <st data-num="01931" class="">that</st> <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> <st data-num="03605 01697">everything</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> I <st data-num="01696" class="">said</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">I would</st>. I will bring on it <st data-num="03605" class="">everything</st> that is <st data-num="03789" class="">written</st> in <st data-num="02088" class="">this</st> <st data-num="05612" class="">book</st>. I will bring on it everything <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> <st data-num="03414" class="">Jeremiah</st> has <st data-num="05012" class="">prophesied</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">against</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="01471" class="">nations</st>.<n id="1" />
For many nations and great kings will make slaves of the king of Babylon and his nation too. I will repay them for all they have done.’”
So the Lord, the God of Israel, spoke to me in a vision: “Take this cup from my hand. It is filled with the wine of my wrath. Take it and make the nations to whom I send you drink it.
When they have drunk it, they will stagger to and fro and act insane. For I will send wars sweeping through them.”
So I took the cup from the Lord’s hand. I made all the nations to whom he sent me drink the wine of his wrath.

I made <st data-num="03389" class="">Jerusalem</st><n id="1" /> and the <st data-num="05892" class="">cities</st> of <st data-num="03063" class="">Judah</st>, its <st data-num="04428" class="">kings</st> and its <st data-num="08269" class="">officials</st> drink it.<n id="2" /> I did it so Judah would <st data-num="05414" class="">become</st> a <st data-num="02723" class="">ruin</st>. I did it so Judah, its kings, and its officials would become an <st data-num="08047 08322">object of</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="08047" class="">horror</st> and of <st data-num="08322" class="">hissing scorn</st>, an <st data-num="07045" class="">example used in curses</st>.<n id="4" /> <st data-num="03117 02088">Such is already becoming the case</st>!<n id="5" />

I made all these other people drink it: <st data-num="06547" class="">Pharaoh</st>, <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st> of <st data-num="04714" class="">Egypt</st>;<n id="1" /> his <st data-num="05650" class="">attendants</st>, his <st data-num="08269" class="">officials</st>, his <st data-num="03605 05971">people</st>,

the <st data-num="03605 06154">foreigners</st> living in Egypt;<n id="1" /> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="04428" class="">kings</st> of the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> of <st data-num="05780" class="">Uz</st>;<n id="2" /> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="04428" class="">kings</st> of the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> of the <st data-num="06430" class="">Philistines</st>,<n id="3" /> the people of <st data-num="0831" class="">Ashkelon</st>, <st data-num="05804" class="">Gaza</st>, <st data-num="06138" class="">Ekron</st>, the <st data-num="07611" class="">people who had been left alive</st> from <st data-num="0795" class="">Ashdod</st>;<n id="4" />
all the people of <st data-num="0123" class="">Edom</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="04124" class="">Moab</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="01121 05983">Ammon</st>;<n id="3" />

<st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="04428" class="">kings</st> of <st data-num="06865" class="">Tyre</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="04428" class="">kings</st> of <st data-num="06721" class="">Sidon</st>;<n id="2" /> all the <st data-num="04428" class="">kings</st> of the <st data-num="0339 0834">coastlands</st> <st data-num="05676" class="">along</st> the <st data-num="03220" class="">sea</st>;<n id="3" />

the people of <st data-num="01719" class="">Dedan</st>, <st data-num="08485" class="">Tema</st>, <st data-num="0938" class="">Buz</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the desert people who <st data-num="07112" class="">cut</st> their <st data-num="07112" class="">hair short</st> at the <st data-num="06285" class="">temples</st>;<n id="2" />

<st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="04428" class="">kings</st> of <st data-num="06152" class="">Arabia</st> <st data-num="03605 04428 06154">who</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="07931" class="">live</st> in the <st data-num="04057" class="">desert</st>;

<st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="04428" class="">kings</st> of <st data-num="02174" class="">Zimri</st>;<n id="1" /> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="04428" class="">kings</st> of <st data-num="05867" class="">Elam</st>;<n id="2" /> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="04428" class="">kings</st> of <st data-num="04074" class="">Media</st>;<n id="3" />

all the kings of the north, whether near or far from one another; and all the other kingdoms that are on the face of the earth. After all of them have drunk the wine of the Lord’s wrath, the king of Babylon must drink it.

Then the Lord said to me, “Tell them that the Lord of Heaven’s Armies, the God of Israel, says, ‘Drink this cup until you get drunk and vomit. Drink until you fall down and can’t get up. For I will send wars sweeping through you.’
If they refuse to take the cup from your hand and drink it, tell them that the Lord of Heaven’s Armies says, ‘You most certainly must drink it!

For take note, I am already beginning to bring disaster on the city that I call my own. So how can you possibly avoid being punished? You will not go unpunished. For I am proclaiming war against all who live on the earth. I, the Lord of Heaven’s Armies, affirm it!’

“Then, Jeremiah, make the following prophecy against them:

‘Like a lion about to attack, the Lord will roar from the heights of heaven;

from his holy dwelling on high he will roar loudly.

He will roar mightily against his land.

He will shout in triumph, like those stomping juice from the grapes,

against all those who live on the earth.

The sounds of battle will resound to the ends of the earth.

For the Lord will bring charges against the nations.

He will pass judgment on all humankind

and will hand the wicked over to be killed in war.’

The Lord so affirms it!

The Lord of Heaven’s Armies says,

‘Disaster will soon come on one nation after another.

A mighty storm of military destruction is rising up

from the distant parts of the earth.’

Those who have been killed by the Lord at that time

will be scattered from one end of the earth to the other.

They will not be mourned over, gathered up, or buried.

Their dead bodies will lie scattered over the ground like manure.

Wail and cry out in anguish, you rulers!

Roll in the dust, you who shepherd flocks of people!

The time for you to be slaughtered has come.

You will lie scattered and fallen like broken pieces of fine pottery.

The leaders will not be able to run away and hide.

The shepherds of the flocks will not be able to escape.

Listen to the cries of anguish of the leaders.

Listen to the wails of the shepherds of the flocks.

They are wailing because the Lord

is about to destroy their lands.

Their peaceful dwelling places will be laid waste

by the fierce anger of the Lord.

The Lord is like a lion who has left his lair.

So their lands will certainly be laid waste

by the warfare of the oppressive nation

and by the fierce anger of the Lord.”
